title: 求助！正版更改邮箱时出现了问题！Error! Request denied.
author: 残灬忍
txt_content:
我想改我的邮箱 但是更改的时候出错了而且我没有找到客服啊！
Change E-mailYou can change the e-mail associated with your account by passing a security challenge.Error! Request denied. To get help with changing your e-mail address visit our Support Center. When contacting customer support, make sure that you include your game purchase transaction ID.








QQ截图20190423162614.png
(59.18 KB, 下载次数: 1)




下载附件


2019-4-23 16:27 上传

replies.author: 残灬忍
replies.txt_content:
我答我自己！
身为一个看不懂英文的人 在谷歌机翻的帮助下找到了联系客服的方法
https://help.mojang.com/customer/en/portal/articles/901432-changing-your-email-address-mojang-accounts-
还有这个！
https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/emails/new

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 HTL9257 于 2019-4-23 17:06 编辑 

你的账号来源正确吗？ 
如果你是官网买的  拿上你当时够买时 mojang发给你邮箱的收据去联系客服更改 然后你安全提问设置了没 我记得修改邮箱需要设置安全提问

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content:
https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/emails/new
通过此链接给mojang发邮件，记得附带上你的订单截图
transaction ID填写你当时购买的订单号

记得用英语
